text: Nabiyow ama koros kol oobisne Qhuraanih Aayoota baxxaqqa luk keenil tankirriyime waqdi Qhiyaamah ayro rabak lakal ugtiyyaa kee cisab yanim nummayse waa maray Nangaaraw qaagite waa ama Qhuraanak kalah yan Qhuraanay Ni Yallitte qaybise waa bah hinnay usuk elle yan gurrak kaa abiddile tik iyyen, Nabiyow anu inni nafsi le gambik kaa abiddilem yok mafaxxintaay yoh maxiqta, anu kalah kataatam mayyu wacyih yol obsima Qhuraan kataatam akke waytek, diggah anu inni Rabbih amri cinek kaxxa ayroh digaalak meesita keenik ixxic
